attributes.action: Not to gaurantee band 5 nursing jobs for newly qualified nurses until all experienced nurses are getting band 6
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nurses with many years experience are only getting band 5 and until they are receiving band 6 like they truly deserve then newly qualified nurses should not get band 5. Ideally all nurses should be getting the band they deserve which includes the newly qualified people.
